title: Today. History was made!

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Lightbane Karthus with ingame gameplay! Price: 975RP Skin name is CONFIRMED as Lightbane Karthus, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body:
Karthus, one of the original 40 champions.....
(Drumroll please!)

FINALLY GOT A SKIN THAT CHANGES HIS PARTICLE EFFECTS!!
WOOOOOOOOOOOOO ITS A MIRACLE!

It only took 10 years, and 7 tries, but its finally here!

welcome to the future Karthus! where the technology of changing sfx colour, is no longer science fiction!
we have been waiting for you... for a long time.

You may now join the ranks of people such as Olaf, Tryndamere, and even Jax, who literally have no special effects at all! But STILL managed to get particle effects changes before you!

Just waiting on Evelynn and Twitch now! this is exciting!

replies.body: technically Olaf has lot's of particle changing effects with the axe throw changing to the actual axe and twitch has a few skins with changing effects
Still somewhat less than Karthus tho
AND LETS NOT FORGET THAT SEXY NASUS SKIN EYYYY!?!?!?!?!

i love it hows his aa's come from his crotch.

the unseen spooge is the deadliest
